      • databaseExists

        public int databaseExists(java.lang.String databaseName,
                          java.lang.String databaseServer,
                          java.lang.String databaseType)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if the database already exists (If the user added it on the past)
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        databaseServer - the server of the given database
        databaseType - the type of the database (Example: MySQL, MSSQL,...)
        Returns:
        the ID of the database if found. -1 if not found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if something goes wrong
